sentences.en: Israel, which has tried for years to mobilise international action against Iran , suddenly appears more sanguine.
sentences.cn: 以色列， 多年来一直试图动员国际社会采取行动（果）霎时看到了转机和希望。

sentences.en: More interconnections provide more ways to mobilise resources and explore alternatives when things go wrong.
sentences.cn: 当出事时,愈多的沟通就会提供越多途径调动资源,探索新方法.

sentences.en: The purpose of the journey is to mobilise public opinion on the controversial issue.
sentences.cn: 此行的目的就是动员公众对这个备受争议的问题发表意见。

sentences.en: With its command economy, China is able to mobilise resources on a massive scale at speed.
sentences.cn: 由于其相对集中的经济体系, 中国可以高速地大规模调用资源.

words.tran_cn: 机动的；易变的，；非固定的
动员，调动；集合，组织；使…流通；使…松动
